definition[0]: to make a problem or subject easy to notice so that people pay attention to it
example[0]: Your résumé should highlight your skills and achievements.
definition[1]: to mark written words with a special coloured pen, or in a different colour on a computer
example[1]: Use the cursor to highlight the name of the document you want to print.
definition[2]: to make some parts of your hair a lighter colour than the rest
definition[3]: the most important, interesting, or enjoyable part of something such as a holiday, performance, or sports competition
example[2]: That weekend in Venice was definitely the highlight of our trip.
example[3]: At 11.30 we’ll be showing highlights from the third round of the FA Cup.
definition[4]: a light bright area on a painting or photograph
